text: @ChrisMurphyCT Whether it's refugees, the poor, or a callous disregard of the dying as he shouts how "happy" the "stock market" made him; to the deadly detriment of too many, @realdonaldtrump lies while completely putting facts backward, such as his lie that covid-19 was "A Democratic Hoax".
